alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will approach the Columbus and Horry county line through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goretown, or 13 miles northwest of North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tabor City, Loris, Hammond, Goretown, Allsbrook, Dulah, Longs and Loris Community Hospital. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 13 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
